Header: All set to hold on-line IT test
Content: The Department of Examination announces that general Information Technology examination will be held as an on-line test as a pilot project. The general Information Technology examination will be held in between 11th and 18th of this month at 655 examination centers. More than 180,000 applicants are eligible to sit for the examination. Admission cards have already been sent to schools according to Examination Department sources. The staff has already been appointed to conduct the examination on-line. The on-line question paper has two parts. Further information regarding the examination can be obtained dialing hotline 1911.
